snippet: Other personalities, like both ... run for the presidency, but just 14 formalized their candidacy and will be on the ballot. Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa was re-elected in January 2021, securing nearly 61 percent of the votes in the first round....

title: The President - President of The Republic - Official Information Site of the Presidency of the Portuguese Republic
snippet: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa was elected President of the Republic for the first time on 24 January 2016 and took office on 9 March.

title: General Election, 10 March 2024
snippet: Following the resignation of Prime Minister Antonio Costa in November 2023, President Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa dissolved Parliament and announced snap legislative elections to be held on 10 March 2024 (Hernández-Morales 2023). The Portuguese parliament (Assembleia de República) is unicameral, ...
